texts: Jan Credits: 65,000; Debits: 52,400 Feb Credits: 66,000; Debits: 51,300 Mar Credits: 65,000; Debits: 53,000 Employer: Innotech Systems Pvt Ltd (salary on 28th) EMI: 8,500 (existing personal loan). Utilities 3,200–4,100 monthly. No cheque bounces observed.
